verses.roman:
daive sārvabhauma tāṅhāke kare daraśana
paḍichā mārite teṅho kaila nivāraṇa

synonyms: daive—by chance; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; tāṅhāke—Him; kare—does; daraśana—seeing; paḍichā—the watchman in the temple; mārite—to beat; teṅho—he; kaila—did; nivāraṇa—forbidding.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu fell down, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya happened to see Him. When the watchman threatened to beat the Lord, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya immediately forbade him.
